content: chart notes ▪ charts are read from the bottom up on the rs right to left on the ws left to right ▪ rs row are black and ws row are grey ▪ chart 1 shows the beginning chain as a wrong side row ▪ charts 2 and 3 start with the previously worked ws row skacel collection increase copyright© 2017 - all rights reserved www skacelknitting com 02/03/2017 chart legend chain single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet chart 1 single_crochet stitch chart 2 half_double_crochet stitch skacel collection increase copyright© 2017 - all rights reserved www skacelknitting com 02/03/2017 chart 3 double_crochet stitch skacel collection increase copyright© 2017 - all rights reserved www skacelknitting com 02/03/2017
